translation.en: Calling all trains!
translation.zh: NETFLIX 原创剧集 呼叫所有火车！

translation.en: ♪ All aboard, let's make tracks ♪
translation.zh: 全员上车 一起出发！

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express ♪
translation.zh: 特快小火车！

translation.en: ♪ Mighty strong and mighty fast ♪
translation.zh: 特别强壮 特别快

translation.en: ♪ Mighty, Mighty Express ♪
translation.zh: 特快特快小火车

translation.en: ♪ Put our crew to the test ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
translation.zh: 让我们来接受考验 特快小火车

translation.en: ♪ It's mighty time ♪
translation.zh: 超级时间到！

translation.en: ♪ All aboard, we're on our way ♪
translation.zh: 全员上车 我们出发

translation.en: ♪ Mighty fast to save the day ♪
translation.zh: 超级速度来解决问题

translation.en: ♪ Mega mission to the max ♪
translation.zh: 超级任务要顺利完成

translation.en: ♪ Let's make tracks ♪
translation.zh: 让我们一起出发！

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express ♪♪
translation.zh: 特快小火车！

translation.en: [Nate] Mighty trains race!
translation.zh: 超级小火车大赛

translation.en: ♪ Delivering balls to the kids at school ♪ ♪ Kids at school, kids at school ♪
translation.zh: 给学校的孩子们送球球 送球球 送球球

translation.en: ♪ Loads to play with and it's super cool ♪ ♪ Super cool ♪♪
translation.zh: 球球不仅好玩而且超级酷 超级酷

translation.en: [giggles] Catchy!
translation.zh: 朗朗上口呢

translation.en: Chugga-chugga zoom!
translation.zh: 咔嚓咔嚓嗖！

translation.en: Where's he going in such a hurry?
translation.zh: 他这么匆忙是要去哪里？

translation.en: Let's follow him and find out. Maybe we can be tricky!
translation.zh: 我们跟着他一探究竟吧 也许我们能惹点麻烦

translation.en: [singing] And sneaky!
translation.zh: 搞点破坏

translation.en: Jazz hands!
translation.zh: 爵士手！

translation.en: [Ricky] Fastest bullet train, coming through!
translation.zh: 史上最快的子弹列车来咯

translation.en: [Nate] Approaching School Station!
translation.zh: 即将到达学校站！

translation.en: [Nate] I've got a delivery of bouncy balls!
translation.zh: 我送来了一批弹性十足的球球

translation.en: Ooh, ooh! Did my special volleyball come?
translation.zh: 是我的特别排球来了吗？

translation.en: I think so. Let's see!
translation.zh: 我想是的 我们来看看

translation.en: Yes! You're the best, Nate!
translation.zh: 耶！你最棒了 内特！

translation.en: And your extend-o car's totally awesome!
translation.zh: 你的延长式车厢也太酷了！

translation.en: [Stella] That explendo-bendo car thingy is kinda awesome!
translation.zh: 那个延长式的东东还真是挺酷的

translation.en: Really awesome! Now what are they doing?
translation.zh: 酷毙了！他们现在在干什么呢？

translation.en: Ah! Giant furry thingy! Ugh...
translation.zh: 毛茸茸的大家伙！

translation.en: Why do animals love us so much? No respect for privacy.
translation.zh: 动物怎么就这么喜欢我们呢？ 一点都不尊重隐私

translation.en: Totally.
translation.zh: 可不是

translation.en: -Oh, hi, Red! -Hi, Nate!
translation.zh: -你好啊 瑞德 -嗨 内特

translation.en: I'm just here to make sure the balls get delivered in a safe and orderly manner.
translation.zh: 我是来确保球都能安全有序地送达的

translation.en: What could go wrong? I'll unload them!
translation.zh: 能出什么问题呢？我来卸货吧

translation.en: Wait, Nate, those containers are too big to pick up at the same time!
translation.zh: 等等 内特！ 那些货箱太大了 不能同时抬起来

translation.en: Nah, I've got it!
translation.zh: 没事的 交给我

translation.en: It's the end of the world!
translation.zh: 世界末日到了！

translation.en: Switching hose car from water to air!
translation.zh: 把软管车厢的水换成空气

translation.en: Rescue Red to the rescue!
translation.zh: 救援车瑞德来救场了！

translation.en: Halt, balls!
translation.zh: 球球们 停下来！

translation.en: Not today, ball!
translation.zh: 球 你休想逃！

translation.en: Gotcha!
translation.zh: 抓到你了！

translation.en: [Ricky] Ooh, that train car Red has is cool, too.
translation.zh: 瑞德的那个车厢也很酷呢

translation.en: It sure is! We should have cool train cars like that!
translation.zh: 的确 我们也该有这么酷的车厢才对

translation.en: Phew! Thanks, Red!
translation.zh: 谢谢你 瑞德

translation.en: Happy to help, Jaden.
translation.zh: 很高兴能帮上忙 贾登

translation.en: -[microphone feedback] -Calling all trains!
translation.zh: 呼叫所有火车！

translation.en: Please report to the Busy Board for today's Mega Mission!
translation.zh: 请到工作台报到 来领取今天的超级任务！

translation.en: [both] It's Mighty Time!
translation.zh: 超级时间到了！

translation.en: Hm... I have an idea! Head to Mission Station, Ricky.
translation.zh: 我有个主意 前往任务站 瑞奇

translation.en: I have a sneaky way to trick Nate, and get all their cargo cars for us!
translation.zh: 我有个狡诈的办法 可以骗内特 把他们的车厢都弄到手

translation.en: Sneaky and tricky?!
translation.zh: 狡诈？骗人？

translation.en: Those are my two favourite words!
translation.zh: 那是我最喜欢的两个词！

translation.en: [singing] It's tricky time!
translation.zh: 骗人时间到了！

translation.en: Today's Mega Mission goes to...
translation.zh: 今天的超级任务要交给…

translation.en: -[Max] Freight Nate! -Chugga-chugga zoom!
translation.zh: 货车内特！ 咔嚓咔嚓嗖！

translation.en: [Max] You'll pick up feed for the farm animals at Port Station
translation.zh: 你要去港口站拿农场动物们的饲料

translation.en: and deliver it to Farm Station.
translation.zh: 然后把饲料送到农场站

translation.en: Freight Nate is never late!
translation.zh: 货车内特从不迟到！

translation.en: Because I go fast, fast, faster!
translation.zh: 因为我跑得快 没有最快 只有更快！

translation.en: You think you're faster than me?
translation.zh: 你觉得你比我快吗？

translation.en: -Where did you come from? -We snuck in. Very sneaky!
translation.zh: 你从哪里来的？ 我们偷溜进来的 非常狡诈

translation.en: So, think you could beat me in a race?
translation.zh: 你觉得你能在比赛中打败我吗？

translation.en: -Yeah! -Uh, Nate?
translation.zh: -能 -呃 内特？

translation.en: -Wanna race me? -Yeah!
translation.zh: -想跟我比赛吗？ -想！

translation.en: And whoever wins gets to keep all the Mighty Express cargo cars?
translation.zh: 谁赢了就能拥有 所有的特快小火车车厢？

translation.en: Yeah! Wait, no!
translation.zh: 对！ 等等 不对！

translation.en: Too late! It worked just like you said it would, Stella!
translation.zh: 太迟了 他上当了 正如你说的那样 斯特拉

translation.en: -[giggles] Very sneaky. -That's my name!
translation.zh: 非常狡诈 那就是我的名字

translation.en: You heard Nate! We're racing!
translation.zh: 你们听到内特说的了 我们要比赛！

translation.en: Whichever train picks up the animal feed
translation.zh: 哪个火车先拿到动物饲料

translation.en: and delivers it to Farm Station first is the winner!
translation.zh: 并把饲料送到农场站就是赢家

translation.en: And when I win, Stella and I get all your cargo cars!
translation.zh: 如果我赢了 斯特拉和我就能得到你们所有的车厢

translation.en: All the cargo cars?! Not good, very bad!
translation.zh: 所有的车厢？不好 非常糟糕

translation.en: And without my digger car, how can I, well... dig?
translation.zh: 没有我的挖掘车厢 我要怎么挖土呢？

translation.en: And without my animal car,
translation.zh: 没有我的动物车厢

translation.en: how can the Popstar Piggies get to their concerts?
translation.zh: 流行明星小猪 要怎么去他们的演唱会呢？

translation.en: They have a lot of concerts, y'all.
translation.zh: 他们演唱会可多了 各位

translation.en: You two tricked Nate. That wasn't fair.
translation.zh: 你们两个耍花招骗了内特 这不公平

translation.en: It's okay, Max, I've got this!
translation.zh: 没事 麦克斯 我搞得定

translation.en: I can beat Ricky with one wheel tied behind my caboose!
translation.zh: 我少了一只轮子也能打败瑞奇

translation.en: You guys believe in me, right?
translation.zh: 你们对我有信心 对吧？

translation.en: Of course we do, Nate.
translation.zh: 当然了 内特

translation.en: We've always got your back. It's just, are you sure you want to race?
translation.zh: 我们一直都支持你 只是…你确定你要比赛吗？

translation.en: Yes! I'm going to win!
translation.zh: 对 我一定会赢的

translation.en: Okay... the race is on!
translation.zh: 好 那就比赛吧

translation.en: But when Nate does win, you two have to feed all the farm animals!
translation.zh: 但如果内特赢了 你们俩就得负责喂所有的农场动物

translation.en: -All the farm an-- -Deal!
translation.zh: -所有的农场动... -成交！

translation.en: Wait, what?!
translation.zh: 等等 什么？

translation.en: Okay, then, Nate, Ricky, now it's time to...
translation.zh: 那好吧 内特 瑞德 现在是时候…

translation.en: -Clean up. -Tune up.
translation.zh: -清洗！ -调整！

translation.en: -Hook up! -To the beat of my sweet track!
translation.zh: -连接！ -跟着我音乐轨道的节奏！

translation.en: ♪ It's time to clean up ♪
translation.zh: 清洗时间到

translation.en: ♪ It's time to tune up ♪
translation.zh: 调整时间到

translation.en: ♪ It's time to hook up ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
translation.zh: 连接时间到 特快小火车

translation.en: It's wash time! Break it down!
translation.zh: 现在是清洗时间 舞动起来吧

translation.en: ♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
translation.zh: 用力擦洗！

translation.en: ♪ Scrub, scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
translation.zh: 擦洗 用力擦洗！

translation.en: ♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
translation.zh: 用力地擦洗！

translation.en: ♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
translation.zh: 用力擦洗！

translation.en: That tickles!
translation.zh: 好痒

translation.en: ♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub ♪
translation.zh: 用力地擦洗！

translation.en: ♪ It's time to clean up ♪ ♪ It's time to tune up ♪
translation.zh: 清洗时间到 调整时间到

translation.en: [Liza] This is an extra special race tune-up!
translation.zh: 这是特别的赛前调整

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express ♪♪
translation.zh: 特快小火车

translation.en: Bye!
translation.zh: 拜拜！

translation.en: You are both Liza-certified racers!
translation.zh: 你们都是莉莎认证的赛车手！

translation.en: [Max] And now it's time to hook up... with your racer cargo cars!
translation.zh: 接下来是连接时间 连上你们的赛车车厢

translation.en: Ricky has Stella with him to help, so I'll ride along with you, Nate!
translation.zh: 瑞奇有斯特拉当助手 所以我和你一起上路吧 内特

translation.en: [Max] Now we're ready to...
translation.zh: 现在我们就可以…

translation.en: [Nico] Not start yet!
translation.zh: 还不能开始！

translation.en: Because you can't have a race without announcers!
translation.zh: 因为赛车怎么能少得了播音员呢？

translation.en: Nate and Ricky, report to the starting line!
translation.zh: 内特和瑞奇 请站到起跑线上

translation.en: This is it! The Main Train Event!
translation.zh: 就是现在了 火车重头戏

translation.en: [Nico] The first ever Tracksville race is about to begin!
translation.zh: 第一届轨道村大赛就要开始了！

translation.en: So get ready to choo-choo!
translation.zh: 所以准备好… 大展身手吧！

translation.en: The first train to deliver the animal feed to Farm Station
translation.zh: 第一个把动物饲料送到农场站的火车

translation.en: will be the Mightiest Race Champion!
translation.zh: 将成为超级大赛的冠军！

translation.en: On your marks!
translation.zh: 各就各位

translation.en: Get set...
translation.zh: 预备

translation.en: [Stella] Go!
translation.zh: 开始！

translation.en: -Go! -Go!
translation.zh: 开始！

translation.en: [giggles] This is gonna be easy! [singing] Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 就是小菜一碟嘛 哦耶！

translation.en: Jazz hands!
translation.zh: 爵士手！

translation.en: [Nate honks] Chugga-chugga zoom! See you at the finish line, Ricky!
translation.zh: 咔嚓咔嚓嗖！终点线见咯 瑞奇！

translation.en: -Huh? -Step on it!
translation.zh: -哈？ -加速！

translation.en: And they're off! Nate jumps out to an early lead!
translation.zh: 他们出发了！ 内特一开始就取得了领先

translation.en: Ricky's going to have to chugga-chugga and choo-choo if he wants to beat Nate!
translation.zh: 瑞奇要想打败内特 就真的得加油了

translation.en: We can catch up! We just need a sneaky shortcut!
translation.zh: 我们能追上的 我们只需要一条狡诈的捷径

translation.en: One tricky shortcut coming up!
translation.zh: 一条滑头捷径马上就到！

translation.en: Hurry, before anyone sees!
translation.zh: 快点 趁现在没人看见

translation.en: It worked! We're ahead of Nate!
translation.zh: 成功了！我们领先内特了！

translation.en: [Stella] Now, for part two.
translation.zh: 现在是第二弹

translation.en: I'll switch those signs!
translation.zh: 我把这些路牌调换一下

translation.en: Now, Nate will drive into the swamp, instead of going to Port Station!
translation.zh: 这下内特会开进沼泽 而不是开往港口站

translation.en: Very sneaky!
translation.zh: 非常狡诈

translation.en: And tricky!
translation.zh: 也非常滑头

translation.en: -[uptempo music playing] -I'm Stella!
translation.zh: 我是斯特拉！

translation.en: I'm Ricky!
translation.zh: 我是瑞奇！

translation.en: I'm sneaky!
translation.zh: 我很狡诈

translation.en: I'm tricky!
translation.zh: 我很滑头

translation.en: -I'm sneakier! -I'm the trickiest!
translation.zh: 我更狡诈 我最滑头了！

translation.en: Huh. I thought Port Station was the other way. Me too.
translation.zh: -我还以为港口站是往右边走 -我也是

translation.en: -Maybe we should-- -Well, the sign can't be wrong!
translation.zh: -也许我们应该… -哎呀 路牌错不了的啦

translation.en: The sign was wrong!
translation.zh: 路牌真的是错了！

translation.en: Stop, Nate, before you get stuck in the swamp!
translation.zh: 快停车 内特 不然会被困在沼泽里的！

translation.en: I won't get stuck.
translation.zh: 我不会被困住的

translation.en: I can go right through it, because I'm super fast and super strong!
translation.zh: 我可以直接冲过去 因为我超快超强壮

translation.en: Fast, fast, faster!
translation.zh: 快 快 再快点！

translation.en: Oops.
translation.zh: 哎呀

translation.en: [Nico] We're coming to you live from the finish line at Farm Station
translation.zh: 我们在农场站的终点线为你现场直播

translation.en: and it looks like Nate's in a very sticky situation...
translation.zh: 看来内特的情况非常棘手

translation.en: Because he's stuck!
translation.zh: 因为他被困住了！

translation.en: [man] Last time on "The Eggs of Our Lives."
translation.zh: 《我们的蛋子》前情提要…

translation.en: -Sorry chickens, we need to see the race. -[clucking]
translation.zh: 抱歉了 鸡们 我们需要看比赛

translation.en: You can get out of the swamp, Nate! -[Liza] We believe in you! -[grunting continues]
translation.zh: 你可以脱离沼泽的 内特！ 我们对你有信心

translation.en: I can't back out.
translation.zh: 我退不出去

translation.en: Oh! I know what to do! Mega stabilizer legs, activate!
translation.zh: 哦 我知道该怎么办了 启动超级稳定支腿！

translation.en: Nice save! But I told you we'd get stuck.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮！ 但我就说我们会被困住的

translation.en: Nothing to worry about, Max!
translation.zh: 没什么好担心的 麦克斯

translation.en: I had it covered. And now we're back in the race!
translation.zh: 我都搞定了 现在我们又回到了比赛中

translation.en: Those signs must have gotten switched somehow.
translation.zh: 那些路牌一定是被调换了

translation.en: [Nate] There!
translation.zh: 搞定！

translation.en: Time to chugga-chugga zoom!
translation.zh: 是时候全速前进了 咔嚓咔嚓嗖！

translation.en: [Ricky] Approaching Port Station!
translation.zh: 即将到达港口站！

translation.en: -[dolphin trilling] -Hi, Tippers!
translation.zh: 嗨 迪普斯！

translation.en: Ahoy!
translation.zh: 啊呵！

translation.en: Oh, and ahoy!
translation.zh: 噢 啊呵！

translation.en: Wow, the rare "double ahoy!"
translation.zh: 哇 难得的双啊呵

translation.en: What?! Hey! How'd you get here so fast?
translation.zh: 什么？你怎么这么快就到这里了？

translation.en: You should be stuck in the swamp!
translation.zh: 你应该被困在沼泽里才对

translation.en: Uh... I mean, uh, stuck in second place!
translation.zh: 我是说 卡在第二名

translation.en: How'd you know about the swamp?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道沼泽的事？

translation.en: [both] Lucky guess?
translation.zh: -侥幸猜中的 -侥幸猜中的

translation.en: Your cargo's ready to cruise on out of here!
translation.zh: 你们的货已经准备好离开这里了

translation.en: [Skipper] You each get two giant bags of animal feed.
translation.zh: 你们各得到两大袋动物饲料

translation.en: Me first!
translation.zh: 我先来！

translation.en: -Thanks, Dipper! -It's Skipper!
translation.zh: 谢啦 迪普！ 是“斯基珀”！

translation.en: Gotta go, I've got a race to win!
translation.zh: 我得走了 我还有一场比赛要赢呢

translation.en: -Thanks, Skipper! -It's Skipper!
translation.zh: 谢了 斯基珀 是“斯基珀”！

translation.en: Oh, wait. That's what he said.
translation.zh: 等等 他是这么说的

translation.en: You're welcome!
translation.zh: 不客气！

translation.en: [Nico] Stage one of the Mightiest Race is done!
translation.zh: 超级大赛的第一阶段结束了

translation.en: And Ricky's ahead by a nose!
translation.zh: 瑞奇以一鼻之差领先

translation.en: [Nico] But will he maintain his lead?
translation.zh: 但他能保持领先吗？

translation.en: Will Nate get stuck again?
translation.zh: 内特会再次被困住吗？

translation.en: -[Nico] So many questions! -[bleating]
translation.zh: 好多问题啊！

translation.en: Chickens!
translation.zh: 鸡们！

translation.en: And Tricky Ricky is in the lead!
translation.zh: 滑头的瑞奇处于领先位置！

translation.en: And remember, if Ricky wins he gets...
translation.zh: 别忘了 如果瑞奇赢了 他就能得到…

translation.en: [gulp] ...all the Mighty Express train cars!
translation.zh: 别忘了 如果瑞奇赢了 他就能得到… 所有的特快小火车车厢

translation.en: [Stella gasps] Nate's gaining on us!
translation.zh: 内特快追上我们了！

translation.en: You've gotta go faster, Ricky!
translation.zh: 你得快点 瑞奇！

translation.en: Or be trickier!
translation.zh: 或者更滑头点

translation.en: Even Nate can't outrun an avalanche.
translation.zh: 即使是内特也跑不过石崩！

translation.en: He's been tricked by Tricky Ricky!
translation.zh: 他被滑头的瑞奇耍了！

translation.en: [singing] And Sneaky Stella! Jazz hands!
translation.zh: 也被狡诈的斯特拉耍了！爵士手

translation.en: Nate's headed straight for an avalanche!
translation.zh: 内特正直冲向石崩！

translation.en: Big trouble! I can't watch!
translation.zh: 麻烦大了 我看不下去了！

translation.en: Nate! Watch out, avalanche!
translation.zh: 内特！小心！石崩！

translation.en: No problem! I can bat those boulders away with my grabber claw!
translation.zh: 不怕啦 我可以用我的勾爪把巨石都击飞

translation.en: There are way too many! You have to dodge them.
translation.zh: 巨石太多了！你得躲开它们！

translation.en: Time for some boulder batting! Mega grabber claw, activate!
translation.zh: 是玩巨石棒球的时候了！ 启动超级勾爪！

translation.en: Boom! Home run! The crowd goes wild for Nate!
translation.zh: 砰！全垒打！观众们都为内特疯狂！

translation.en: I knew there were too many to stop.
translation.zh: 我就知道巨石太多 阻止不了

translation.en: Nate! Use your stabilizer legs to push us out of here!
translation.zh: 内特 用你的稳定支腿把我们推出去

translation.en: Maybe I can use my stabilizer legs to get us out!
translation.zh: 也许我可以用我的稳定支腿 把我们弄出去！

translation.en: Mega stabilizer legs, activate!
translation.zh: 启动超级稳定支腿！

translation.en: Up and over! Bye-bye, boulders!
translation.zh: 上升 越过 拜拜啦 巨石们！

translation.en: And Nate's made it past the boulders!
translation.zh: 内特成功越过了巨石！

translation.en: He did?!
translation.zh: 他成功了？他成功了！

translation.en: He did! Yes! Woo-hoo!
translation.zh: 他成功了？他成功了！ 太好了！万岁！

translation.en: Huzzah!
translation.zh: 太好了！万岁！

translation.en: [giggles] I mean, uh, I mean... -Excellent work, racer. -[giggling]
translation.zh: 我是说 干得漂亮 赛车手！

translation.en: Nice job, Nate. But next time, try listening to me.
translation.zh: 干得好 内特！ 但下次试着听我说 也许我们能够避免更多的轨道麻烦

translation.en: Maybe we'll avoid any more track trouble.
translation.zh: 但下次试着听我说 也许我们能够避免更多的轨道麻烦

translation.en: It's alright, we're back in the race! Chugga-chugga zoom!
translation.zh: 没事的 我们又回到比赛中了 咔嚓咔嚓嗖！

translation.en: We're in the lead! Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 我们领先了！哦耶！

translation.en: [both] ♪ We're gonna win the race ♪ ♪ Yes we are ♪ ♪ We're gonna win every cargo car ♪
translation.zh: 我们会赢得比赛 没错 我们会赢得所有的车厢

translation.en: ♪ And then Mighty Express Will be second best ♪
translation.zh: 特快小火车只能乖乖地输给

translation.en: ♪ To the Stella and Ricky superstars ♪ ♪ To the Ricky and Stella superstars ♪
translation.zh: -超级巨星斯特拉和瑞奇！ -超级巨星瑞奇和斯特拉！

translation.en: Yes! I'm catching up!
translation.zh: 太好了！我追上了！

translation.en: Oh, no! The avalanche didn't stop him!
translation.zh: 不好了 石崩没能阻止他！

translation.en: Time to kick it into overdrive.
translation.zh: 是时候超速前进了

translation.en: Nate, you need to hit your brakes!
translation.zh: 内特！你得踩刹车！

translation.en: That turn is too sharp, you're gonna--
translation.zh: 那个转弯太急了 你会…

translation.en: Win the race! That's what I'm gonna do!
translation.zh: 赢得比赛！这就是我要做的！

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: Oh, no! Nate's derailed!
translation.zh: 糟糕！内特脱轨了！

translation.en: [Stella] See you at the finish line!
translation.zh: 终点线见咯！

translation.en: -[monitor chiming] -Nate, Max, come in! Are you okay?!
translation.zh: 内特 麦克斯 请回话 你们没事吧？

translation.en: [sighs] Yeah, we're okay.
translation.zh: 我们没事

translation.en: But I should've listened to Max about that turn.
translation.zh: 但关于转弯的事 我真应该听麦克斯的

translation.en: And the boulders. And the swamp.
translation.zh: 还有巨石的事 还有沼泽的事

translation.en: [sighs] Now Ricky and Stella are gonna win the race,
translation.zh: 现在瑞奇和斯特拉会赢得比赛

translation.en: and everyone's gonna lose their cargo cars.
translation.zh: 大家都会失去他们的车厢

translation.en: And it's all my fault, because I didn't listen!
translation.zh: 而这都是我的错 因为我不听劝告！

translation.en: The race isn't over until someone crosses the finish line.
translation.zh: 在有人越过终点线之前 比赛都不算结束

translation.en: You can still win!
translation.zh: 你还是可以赢的

translation.en: You're right, Max!
translation.zh: 你说得对 麦克斯

translation.en: But not listening to you keeps getting me in trouble.
translation.zh: 但不听你的话总是让我陷入麻烦

translation.en: So what should I do, Max, buddy?
translation.zh: 所以我该怎么做 麦克斯伙计？

translation.en: If you use your stabilizer legs to jump toward that rock,
translation.zh: 如果你用你的稳定支腿跳向那块石头

translation.en: then grab it with your grabber claw, you might be able to swing us back up.
translation.zh: 然后用你的勾爪抓住它 你也许能把我们甩上去

translation.en: But you'll have to listen closely.
translation.zh: 但你得仔细听我说

translation.en: Chugga-chugga can do!
translation.zh: 咔嚓咔嚓没问题！

translation.en: Mega grabber claw, activate!
translation.zh: 启动超级勾爪！

translation.en: Hold on tight! Here we go!
translation.zh: 抓紧了 出发咯！

translation.en: Grab it... ...now!
translation.zh: 抓住它…就是现在！

translation.en: Chugga-chugga swing!
translation.zh: 咔嚓咔嚓甩！

translation.en: -Woo-hoo! -Awesome!
translation.zh: -哦吼！ -太棒了！

translation.en: I wanna do that again! [chuckling]
translation.zh: 我真想再来一次

translation.en: [chuckles] Maybe another time!
translation.zh: 还是下次吧

translation.en: We've got a race to win!
translation.zh: 我们有一场比赛要赢呢

translation.en: With Nate stuck on that ledge,
translation.zh: 现在内特被困在那块岩石上 我们可以慢慢来了

translation.en: we can take it nice and slow, and still win!
translation.zh: 现在内特被困在那块岩石上 我们可以慢慢来了 而且还能赢

translation.en: Racing is so easy!
translation.zh: 赛车真是太简单了

translation.en: Hi! Bye!
translation.zh: 嗨！拜！

translation.en: Oh. Hi, Nate.
translation.zh: 哦 嗨 内特

translation.en: [both] Nate?! Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: -内特？快上！ -内特？

translation.en: We're approaching the rope bridge!
translation.zh: 我们正在接近索桥！

translation.en: You need to slow down when you go over it, so you don't derail again.
translation.zh: 过桥的时候放慢速度 免得再次脱轨

translation.en: I'm listening to all your advice.
translation.zh: 你的劝告我全都听

translation.en: [singing] See you later!
translation.zh: 回头见！

translation.en: Ricky, you're going too fast! It's not safe!
translation.zh: 瑞奇 你开得太快了 这样不安全！

translation.en: You're not gonna trick me! That's my job!
translation.zh: 你骗不了我的 那是我的专长

translation.en: So... maybe Nate wasn't trying to trick me.
translation.zh: 也许内特并不是想骗我

translation.en: Hang on, I'm coming!
translation.zh: 撑着 我来了

translation.en: [Nate] Gotcha!
translation.zh: 抓住了！

translation.en: Phew! Thanks, Nate.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 内特

translation.en: I know we're racing against each other, but I just want to say,
translation.zh: 我知道我们正在互相竞赛 但我只想真诚地向你说声…

translation.en: from the bottom of my wheels...
translation.zh: 但我只想真诚地向你说声…

translation.en: See you at the finish line!
translation.zh: 在终点线见吧！

translation.en: [giggles] You've been tricked... -[Nate coughing] -...by Tricky Ricky!
translation.zh: 你被滑头的瑞奇骗了！

translation.en: And Sneaky Stella! Jazz hands!
translation.zh: 也被狡诈的斯特拉骗了！爵士手！

translation.en: -That really was tricky! -And sneaky!
translation.zh: 那真是太滑头了 也太狡诈了

translation.en: [both] That's our name!
translation.zh: 那是我们的名字！

translation.en: Now I really, really, really want to win!
translation.zh: 现在我真的真的很想赢

translation.en: To the max!
translation.zh: -超级想！ -对！

translation.en: Yeah! No way they're gonna get our cargo cars.
translation.zh: 他们休想得到我们的车厢

translation.en: Chugga-chugga win!
translation.zh: 咔嚓咔嚓赢定了！

translation.en: [Nico] This is it! They're in the final stretch!
translation.zh: 就是现在了！ 他们进入最后阶段了！

translation.en: It's Ricky in the lead. Now, it's Nate coming in from behind!
translation.zh: 领先的是瑞奇 现在内特从后面追上来了

translation.en: [Nico] Now Ricky! Now Nate!
translation.zh: 现在是瑞奇 现在是内特！

translation.en: [Nico and Liza] Ricky! Nate! Ricky! Nate! Ricky! Nate!
translation.zh: 瑞奇 内特

translation.en: [Liza] Look, here they come!
translation.zh: 快看 他们来了！

translation.en: This is gonna be close!
translation.zh: 胜负难分啊！

translation.en: Goodbye sweet, sweet cargo cars!
translation.zh: 再见了 亲爱的车厢们！

translation.en: Huh?
translation.zh: 啊？

translation.en: Ricky's winning!
translation.zh: 瑞奇要赢了！

translation.en: [all chanting] Go, Nate, go! Go, Nate, go!
translation.zh: 加油 内特！

translation.en: -[trains] Go, Nate, go! -[Milo] Come on, Nate, you've got this!
translation.zh: -加油 内特！ -来吧 内特 你行的！

translation.en: Now that's something I love to hear!
translation.zh: 这话正合我意！

translation.en: -I'm not letting my friends down! -[revving]
translation.zh: 我是不会让我的朋友们失望的

translation.en: [Nate and Max] Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 哦耶！

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[Milo] Good job, Nate!
translation.zh: -耶！ -干得好 内特！

translation.en: Done and delivered!
translation.zh: 货安全送达！

translation.en: Yeah! You did it!
translation.zh: 耶 你成功了！

translation.en: We get to keep all our cargo cars!
translation.zh: 我们可以保留所有的车厢了

translation.en: Yee-haw!
translation.zh: 咦哈！

translation.en: -[Red] Well done, Nate! -[Milo] Well done, Nate! Woo-hoo!
translation.zh: -耶 内特！ -干得好 内特！

translation.en: You did it, Nate! You won!
translation.zh: 你成功了 内特！你赢了！

translation.en: Thanks, Max. I couldn't've done it without listening to you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 麦克斯 全多亏了你的劝告

translation.en: I can't believe we didn't win.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信我们竟然输了

translation.en: You know what that means!
translation.zh: 你知道这意味着什么吧

translation.en: Yeah! It means we're getting outta here!
translation.zh: 知道 这意味着我们要离开这里了！

translation.en: [Red] Not so fast!
translation.zh: 别溜得那么快！

translation.en: As official race safety expert and rule keeper,
translation.zh: 作为官方比赛安全专家和规则维护者

translation.en: it is my duty to remind you that you must now keep the promise you made
translation.zh: 我有责任提醒你们 你们现在必须履行 你们在比赛开始前作出的承诺

translation.en: at the start of the race!
translation.zh: 你们现在必须履行 你们在比赛开始前作出的承诺

translation.en: In other words, y'all got some critters to feed!
translation.zh: 换句话说 你们有小动物要喂咯

translation.en: Okay, we can help!
translation.zh: 好吧 我们可以帮忙

translation.en: Ah! Stop dancing on me!
translation.zh: 别在我身上跳舞了！

translation.en: Chicken on my head, chicken on my head!
translation.zh: 鸡在我头上！
